name: Pick It Up! (Cole Beernaerts)
description:
Pick It Up! is a gathering/crafting game that focuses on turning something mundane into something fun! Collect, use, and craft hoards of unique items with various personalities to unlock new areas, upgrade your equipment, and improve the livelihood of your village! What will you discover?

Pick up items, throw them at enemies, into your stash, and at the world. Every item has a unique effect, and half the fun comes from finding out what it does! Discover interesting areas with their own brand of fun, from a lush field, to an ore-rich mine, and to the bounds of the sky! In this sandbox, pick up the fun and help your village prosper to return it to its former glory! 

Game is currently in development, and I am looking to collaborate with other people on this project, so if you would like to make this game with me, please hit me up! Specifically looking for artists, sound designers, and composers. 

Any sound, music, or art assets used are not final and any copyrighted content belongs to it's rightful owners.
